chunk:
Arilan Skincare Oxygenating Mask

Brand: Arilan Skincare

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Purified Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Hyaluronic Acid, Hydrogen Peroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.

Directions: Apply a thin layer to face and neck. Rub in circular motion to a thin layer. Leave on for 15 - 20 minutes while relaxing. Rinse with lukewarm water. Towel dry and follow with Arilan Hydration with Hyaluronic Cream.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
